caption.title: Data on preprints included in the analysis.
caption.p: “preprint_date” is the initial preprint submission date from the respective repository. “pmid” is the PubMed identification number the preprint was matched to (if matched). “journal” and “pub_type” are from the PubMed entry. “publisher” indicates the publisher if the publisher signed the data sharing statement. “new_data” and “new_analysis” indicate whether the authors judged the manuscript to contain new data or analysis, respectively (1 = True).
Click here for additional data file.
